scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Lamentation of Christ, with a group of figures gathered around the body of Christ laid out on a stone sarcophagus. Christ's body is shown wounded and wrapped in a white shroud. Several figures, including the Virgin Mary and other mourners, are shown with halos, indicating their sanctity. The figures are dressed in medieval attire. The background is a stylized landscape of rolling green hills under a blue sky. The sarcophagus itself is a prominent architectural element in the foreground.
